message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth $1500000 to us. However, we are open to negotiation and would like to hear your thoughts on this offer.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, $1500000 is higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for it. This is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product and allows for some room for negotiation.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget while still reflecting the value of our product, we would like to propose a counteroffer of $1300000. We believe this price is fair and allows for a reasonable negotiation. We look forward to your feedback.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $1300000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, which is the maximum I can afford. I'm confident this is a fair price that recognizes the value of your product while staying within my budget.
